body: May I ask how to create a monthly bar chart for an output variable for the entire building that is not colored by zone? For the bar chart of the monthly cooling loads by zone as shown below, how to merge the two zones' data into one bar? Thanks! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/krHPGcggBY5bp2*xIVn0G*QZHF6PamEC-1QwzeLcifVO29Od-osUWsFLg6lgOK2D9-zfO3m6NsxfI8-HYWtq-Bu1HOkz*U5b/Image6.png) ... or even merge monthly data for different zones and output variables altogether? Thanks! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/krHPGcggBY5ST6FHNxHJIDUtXZ6NqrmvPSZxDs9Qp56T7venjov2yy89NgIp2wNYcLJkx7RWfIwDnLV7rwn1R0iddgNg5*EB/Image7.png)
topic: how to create a monthly bar chart for an output variable for the entire building?
